response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. My proposal is to offer you this remarkable asset for $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between our interests.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to facilitate a smooth and beneficial transaction for both parties.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
